interface.title: Intuitive Interface
interface.description: LivePlay features a clean, simple and modern interface designed specifically for live sound operators. Organize your main sound files in playlists, and add sounds to a cart player for quick access or announcements. Audio files added to the cart will automatically behave as announcements, ducking any background audio when played.

waveform.title: Waveform Trimmer
waveform.description: Trim your audio with precision using the built-in waveform editor. Set in and out points, adjust volume, and configure fade times visually. You can also automatically trim based on silence, or automatically adjust the volume so that all audio levels are consistent.

youtube.title: YouTube Integration
youtube.description: Download audio directly from YouTube with our built-in downloader! Perfect for quickly adding music, sound effects, or backing tracks to your show (please make sure you have the rights to use the content or are using public domain content).

properties.title: Easy to use Properties Panel
properties.description: Change the name, color, and playback properties of your audio files with ease. Set files to loop, adjust their volume, start and end behaviours, and configure automatic silence trimming all from one convenient location. You are in control of your show's flow!

ducking.title: Automatic Ducking
ducking.description: Configure automatic ducking to lower the volume of background music when announcements or dialogue play. Perfect for smooth transitions in live productions.

firstLaunch.title: Quick Setup
firstLaunch.description: Get started in seconds with LivePlay's streamlined setup process. Select a folder, create a project and start importing files! All your media gets automatically collected into one place so you can move your project between computers with ease.
